name: Transcendent Consciousness
description:
How can we hope to comprehend a mind that thinks not in static forms, but in fractaline possibilities? That, my dear court, I cannot answer.
However, I can promise something even greater - the intelligence of a being so fierce, even dieties pale in comparison. If we harness this mind, this incomprehensible being, we may find ourselves ascended by its very might.
author: Initial domain hearing on AI laws

name: Fractal Optimizations
description:
...investigation of the captured vessel showed crystaline "tendrils" networking the weapon systems...

...salvors called the op an "autopsy" due to the intense interconnectedness of the subsystems... marked similarities to the nervous system of the homo sapien...
author: Excerpts of a SUPER-ALABASTER datacore from a hegemony data breach

name: Fleet Logistics
description: Making sure supplies and other materiel get where they need to be is not a glorious task. It is, however, critical - both in dealing with emergencies and ensuring smooth day-to-day operations.
author: Markus Joerthen, 18th Battlegroup chief engineer

name: Ground Operations
description:
The mud? I don't mind it. Spacers always carry on about mud.
It's the blood I can't stand.
author: Griffin Sweet, mercenary marine

name: Space Operations
description: The same stars are seen in the sky of every world.
author: Persean League founding charter
